text.en: Knower of all scriptures, accepted and cared for by ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: Zhung luk künkhyen khandrö jesu zung

text.en: Glorious Virūpa, who achieved the state of realization,
text.en-trans: ngöngyur sa nyé palden bi rupa

text.en: Lord of an ocean of siddha families, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: drub rik gyatsö tsowor solwa deb

text.en: Dispel all obstacles, and grant me ordinary and supreme siddhis!
text.en-trans: barché kün sel choktün ngödrub tsol
